    • Method Detail

      • getAutoDiscoverDelegation

        public boolean getAutoDiscoverDelegation()

      • allImplicitDelegators

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> allImplicitDelegators(java.lang.String delegate,
                                                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> initialDelegators)
                                                       throws DOException
        List all objects which delegate to the given id via one of the initial delegators. Can bypass initial delegators by passing singleton list of the delegate itself. Delegation objects and repositories are looked up in the handle system.
        Throws:
        DOException

      • allImplicitDelegators

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> allImplicitDelegators(java.lang.String delegate,
                                                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> initialDelegators,
                                                              boolean alwaysOwnDelegationObject,
                                                              java.lang.String repository)
                                                       throws DOException
        List all objects which delegate to the given id via one of the initial delegators. Can bypass initial delegators by passing singleton list of the delegate itself.
        Parameters:
        alwaysOwnDelegationObject - if true, each delegator is assumed to manage its own delegation; if false, a delegation object is looked up in the handle system
        repository - the repository each delegator lives in (looked up if null)
        Throws:
        DOException

      • checkImplicitDelegation

        public boolean checkImplicitDelegation(java.lang.String delegate,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> initialDelegators,
                                       java.lang.String delegator)
                                throws DOException
        Check whether a delegate is implicitly delegated to by a delegator via one of the initial delegators. Can bypass initial delegators by passing singleton list of the delegate itself. Delegation objects and repositories are looked up in the handle system.
        Throws:
        DOException

      • checkImplicitDelegation

        public boolean checkImplicitDelegation(java.lang.String delegate,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> initialDelegators,
                                       java.lang.String delegator,
                                       boolean alwaysOwnDelegationObject,
                                       java.lang.String repository)
                                throws DOException
        Check whether a delegate is implicitly delegated to by a delegator via one of the initial delegators. Can bypass initial delegators by passing singleton list of the delegate itself.
        Parameters:
        alwaysOwnDelegationObject - if true, each delegator is assumed to manage its own delegation; if false, a delegation object is looked up in the handle system
        repository - the repository each delegator lives in (looked up if null)
        Throws:
        DOException
